author: Janice Williams
title: What You Missed on Late Night: Samuel L. Jackson Orders Everyone to 'Stay the F**k at Home' on 'Kimmel'
description: Plus Demi Lovato and Jimmy Fallon painted portraits of each other while Elizabeth Warren tells Seth Meyers how she would have tackled coronavirus.
content: Cases of coronavirus in the United States continue to climb, reaching nearly the 190,000 mark as of Wednesday. So naturally, it was still the main topic of discussion as late-night hosts filmed from their bunkers on Tuesday night but, luckily, with a bit of c… [+4072 chars]
